Open the Messages application, displaying the "Help" screen with popular help resources.
Click the three-dot menu icon to open a dropdown menu.
Click "Settings" to access the application's configuration options.
Scroll down within the Settings menu to reveal options such as "Help improve Messages" and "About, terms & privacy".
Click on "Spam protection" to access its settings.
Disable the "Enable spam protection" toggle.
Navigate back to the "Settings" menu from the "Spam protection" screen.
Navigate back from the 'Settings' screen to the main Messages interface.
